title: TT round-up: Dygert, McNulty win US titles, Evenepoel slips out, Pogačar victorious in comeback
content:
Dygert and McNulty power to US titles against the clock as time trial racing across the globe sees the cream rise to the top.

Read the full article at TT round-up: Dygert, McNulty win US titles, Evenepoel slips out, Pogačar victorious in comeback on Velo.
